attributes.action: Repeal of mandatory vaccination to avoid social segregation.
attributes.additional_details: Lifting of any law that obliges people to be vaccinated and prevent costumers and employees from being discriminated against for not having the vaccine.
attributes.background: Millions of British citizens and immigrants are losing their right to freedom of choice and being segregated for not accepting a vaccine that has already claimed more than 1 million victims, many of them fatal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
